name: Fisherman's Quest (Beta)
description:
(This is a beta version of our game. More monsters to fight will be added soon. Please feel free to leave any feedback that you have, we will take it into account during development.)

You're the captain of a fishing vessel, tasked with defeating the monsters inhabiting the ocean. Upgrade your ship, amass resources, and fight against aquatic monsters in your quest to restore peace to your kingdom's waters!

Controls:

WASD: Move

Left Click: Attack/cast fishing rod

Right Click: Block/use inventory item

Space: Dodge in combat, open/close facility menus

M: Equip/sheathe sword

I: Open inventory
